name: S-P-I-N-E
description:
Nobody likes a stiff. Someone who's not willing to go outside the edges of whats ethical. What's legal. In a day and age where video games and life in general do not give enough stimulation to the media brainwashed mind, an app called S-P-I-N-E exists. 

Now here's Derek, a vanilla guy. Vanilla and losing the support of his involved friends, receives a final email that pushes him over the edge. 

My question is to you:

DO YOU DARE? 

___________________________________________

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move, Left Shift to Run. 
  • E to interact with objects and Q to use phone 
  • There's some other stuff but you'll find out...

THE LINK TO THE FILE OF THE GAME 

IF THE SHARE LINK DOESNT WORK...

THIS IS NEW WORKING LINK

It may throw an error saying cannot view file but a download should be available either way...
